EmailTemplate.subject: Your Ergonomic Chair Awaits
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/government/default.aspx?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Pick A Chair, Any Chair! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-chair.aspx?cmp=EBFGJUNE19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Tired of guessing how to find the perfect ergonomic chair? We’ve got the tips you need to find your set up. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/writing-deal-centre-February-18-offer-3.aspx?cmp=EBTAXFEB18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-chair.aspx?cmp=EBFGJUNE19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-511-4534
